/@Z9YB+?%MQwD]rn/x=R: function dataURItoBlob(dataURI) {   // convert base64 to raw binary data held in a string   // doesn't handle URLEncoded DataURIs - see SO answer #6850276 for code that does this   var byteString = atob(dataURI.split(',')[1]);    // separate out the mime component   var mimeString = dataURI.split(',')[0].split(':')[1].split(';')[0]    // write the bytes of the string to an ArrayBuffer   var ab = new ArrayBuffer(byteString.length);    // create a view into the buffer   var ia = new Uint8Array(ab);    // set the bytes of the buffer to the correct values   for (var i = 0; i < byteString.length; i++) {       ia[i] = byteString.charCodeAt(i);   }    // write the ArrayBuffer to a blob, and you're done   var blob = new Blob([ab], {type: mimeString});   return blob;  }  dataURItoBlob(
